text: "All Night Long (All Night)" is a 1983 song by Lionel Ritchie. It was the first single from his second studio album Can't Slow Down. It topped the single charts in Australia, Canada, Finland, the Netherlands, South Africa and the United States. It was re-released as a duet with Guy Sebastian in 2011. It was remade in 2019 by Benjamin Ingrosso. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Lionel Richie songs Category:Guy Sebastian songs Category:Reggae songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: All Night Long (All Night)
